creator: bkeesara2000@hotmail.com
text:
If the task
<echo message="Hello World"/>
is written in an ant script the output will be

[echo] Hello World

should have a quiet attribute or (any other attribute) which will print the
output as
Hello World

The [echo] part is not outputted by the echo task. It is done
by ant core.

One can remove the [echo] by calling ant with
ant -emacs -file build.xml
creator: peter.reilly@corvil.com
